Clojure Users Group: Meetup in copenhagen, may 12th

29 Apr 2011

I've managed to arrange a free DCUG meetup in Copenhagen in conjunction with Goto CPH. We will be several Clojure "stars": Christophe Grand and Lau Jensen, Stefan Richter and Stefan Tilkov. Right now we have only one registration apart from the people above and myself - so come on :) Time and date: May 12th, Thursday 19:15 - 20:15 / Location: Room 202 Location: GOTO Copenhagen 2011 takes place in Radisson Blu Falconer Hotel & Conference Center Info and registration: http://gotocon.com/cph-2011/presentation/UserGroup-Meeting:%20Clojure%20stars%20and%20you
